00029 //========================================================================

00032 //  Not described in the book, but a nice little parser for grabbing 
00033 //  data out of CSV files.
00034 //
00035 //========================================================================
00036 
00037 class CSV
00038 {
00039 public:
00040         CSV(const TCHAR* filename);
00041         ~CSV();
00042 
00043         void ParseItem(char const * const line, int item, char *output) const;
00044         void ReadLine(char const * const section, char const * const entry, char *output) const;
00045         int const GetInt(char const * const entry, const int& item=0) const;
00046         int const GetInt(char const * const section, char const * const entry, const int& item) const;
00047         void GetString(char const * const entry, char *outputString) const;
00048         bool const GetBool(char const * const entry) const;
00049         int GetEnum(char const * const entry) const;
00050 
00051 protected:
00052         char *m_orig_file;
00053         int m_length;
00054 };
